Summary: I saw a thin silver object west of the austin skyline. It looked like a commercial jet until it rotated showing its shape to be a circular disk. It shifted and vanished
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home on Mo-Pac fwy heading South towards Austin and I saw a thin silver shape. It was small and looked to be quite a long distant away. In my sight it looked to be about an inch long so it's hard to tell really how big it was. It matched the appearance of a plane landing or taking off from Bergstrom Intl Airport. It then rotated and showed its shape to be a solid circular disk. It shifted slightly and vanished. The only other person in my vehicle was my 5 year-old daughter and she didnt see it.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around July 21st 2008
